activities.name: Delete Old Calendar Event Blob Data

dependsOn.activity: Delete Old Calendar Event Blob Data

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@{concat('with Internal_email_domains (EmailDomain) 
AS
(
    SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTRING(u.mail, CHARINDEX(''@'', u.mail), LEN(u.mail)) FROM users u WHERE u.mail IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT DISTINCT 
fev.[Id],
fev.[CreatedDateTime],
fev.[LastModifiedDateTime],
fev.[iCalUId],
fev.[Subject],
fev.[Importance],
fev.[Sensitivity],
fev.[IsAllDay],
fev.[IsCancelled],
fev.[IsOrganizer],
fev.[ResponseRequested],
fev.[ContentType],
[dbo].[udf_StripHTML](fev.[Content]) As Content,
fev.[StartDateTime],
fev.[StartTimeZone],
fev.[EndDateTime],
fev.[EndTimeZone],
fev.[LocationDisplayName],
fev.[AttendeeStatusResponse],
CAST(CASE WHEN fev.[AttendeeStatusResponse] = ''Microsoft.OutlookServices.ResponseType''''None'''''' or fev.[AttendeeStatusResponse] = ''Microsoft.OutlookServices.ResponseType''''NotResponded''''''  THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS BIT) as IsRead, 
fev.[AttendeeName],
fev.[AttendeeAddress],
fev.[Organizer],
fev.[OrganizerName],
fev.[ODataType],
fev.[puser],
fev.[ptenant],
fev.[datarow],
fev.[userrow],
fev.[pagerow],
u.aboutMe as OrganizerAboutMe,  
u.birthday as OrganizerBirthday,   
u.hireDate as OrganizerHireDate,  
u.mySite as OrganizerMySite,  
u.preferredName as OrganizerPreferredName,  
u.accountEnabled as OrganizerAccountEnabled,  
u.city as OrganizerCity,  
u.companyName as OrganizerCompanyName,   
u.country as OrganizerCountry,  
u.createdDateTime as OrganizerCreatedDateTime,  
ISNULL(u.department, ''N/A'') as OrganizerDepartment,  
u.displayName as OrganizerDisplayName,  
u.givenName as OrganizerGivenName,  
u.id as OrganizerId,  
u.jobTitle as OrganizerJobTitle,  
u.mail as OrganizerMail,  
u.officeLocation as OrganizerOfficeLocation,  
u.onPremisesImmutableId as OrganizerOnPremisesImmutableId,  
u.postalCode as OrganizerPostalCode,  
u.preferredLanguage as OrganizerPreferredLanguage,  
u.state as OrganizerState,  
u.streetAddress as OrganizerStreetAddress,  
u.surname as OrganizerSurname,  
u.usageLocation as OrganizerUsageLocation,  
u.userPrincipalName as OrganizerUserPrincipalName,  
u.userType as OrganizerUserType,  
u.puser as OrganizerPuser ,  
u.ptenant as OrganizerPtenant,  
u.pAdditionalInfo as OrganizerPAdditionalInfo,  
u.datarow as OrganizerDatarow,  
u.userrow as OrganizerUserrow,  
u.pagerow as OrganizerPagerow,
ISNULL(u.reportsTo, ''-'') as OrganizerReportsTo,
u.managerEmail as OrganizerManagerEmail,
user_recipient_with_manager.managerEmail as AttendeeManagerEmail,
ISNULL(user_recipient_with_manager.reportsTo, ''-'') as AttendeeReportsTo
, CAST(CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(fev.[AttendeeAddress], CHARINDEX(''@'', fev.[AttendeeAddress]), LEN(fev.[AttendeeAddress]))   NOT IN (SELECT EmailDomain FROM Internal_email_domains) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS BIT) as IsExternalEvent
, CAST(CASE WHEN fev.AttendeeAddress = u.managerEmail THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS BIT) as EventWithManager 
, CAST(CASE WHEN user_recipient_with_manager.managerEmail = fev.[Organizer] THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS BIT) as EventWithSubordinate 
, '  , '''' , pipeline().parameters.batchEndTime, '''' ,' as Version
FROM flattened_events fev  JOIN users u 
on fev.[Organizer] = u.mail AND u.mail is not null
LEFT JOIN users user_recipient_with_manager ON fev.AttendeeAddress = user_recipient_with_manager.mail;', '')}

@{concat('select
fev.[CreatedDateTime],
fev.[LastModifiedDateTime],
fev.[iCalUId],
fev.[Subject],
fev.[Importance],
fev.[Sensitivity],
fev.[IsAllDay],
fev.[IsCancelled],
fev.[IsOrganizer],
fev.[ResponseRequested],
fev.[ContentType],
[dbo].[udf_StripHTML](fev.[Content]) As Content,
fev.[StartDateTime],
fev.[StartTimeZone],
fev.[EndDateTime],
fev.[EndTimeZone],
fev.[LocationDisplayName],
fev.[Organizer],
fev.[OrganizerName],
fev.[ODataType],
fev.[puser],
fev.[ptenant],
fev.[datarow],
fev.[userrow],
fev.[pagerow],
fev.[OrganizerAboutMe],
fev.[OrganizerBirthday],
fev.[OrganizerHireDate],
fev.[OrganizerMySite],
fev.[OrganizerPreferredName],
fev.[OrganizerAccountEnabled],
fev.[OrganizerCity],
fev.[OrganizerCompanyName],
fev.[OrganizerCountry],
fev.[OrganizerCreatedDateTime],
ISNULL(fev.[OrganizerDepartment], ''N/A'') as OrganizerDepartment,
fev.[OrganizerDisplayName],
fev.[OrganizerGivenName],
fev.[OrganizerId],
fev.[OrganizerJobTitle],
fev.[OrganizerMail],
fev.[OrganizerOfficeLocation],
fev.[OrganizerOnPremisesImmutableId],
fev.[OrganizerPostalCode],
fev.[OrganizerPreferredLanguage],
fev.[OrganizerState],
fev.[OrganizerStreetAddress],
fev.[OrganizerSurname],
fev.[OrganizerUsageLocation],
fev.[OrganizerUserPrincipalName],
fev.[OrganizerUserType],
fev.[OrganizerPuser],
fev.[OrganizerPtenant],
fev.[OrganizerPAdditionalInfo],
fev.[OrganizerDatarow],
fev.[OrganizerUserrow],
fev.[OrganizerPagerow],
fev.[IsExternalEvent],
fev.[EventWithManager],
fev.[EventWithSubordinate],
ISNULL(fev.[OrganizerReportsTo], ''-'') as OrganizerReportsTo,
fev.[OrganizerManagerEmail],
fev.[Id],
agg_events.iCalUId,
agg_events.AttendeeNames,
agg_events.AttendeeAddresses,
CAST(CASE agg_events.IsExternalEvent WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS BIT) As IsExternalEvent,
CAST(CASE agg_events.EventWithManager WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS BIT) As EventWithManager,
CAST(CASE agg_events.EventWithSubordinate WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS BIT) As EventWithSubordinate,
CAST(CASE agg_events.IsRead WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS BIT) As IsRead
  from (select
    iCalUId,
      string_agg(cast([AttendeeName] as [varchar](max)),'', '') As AttendeeNames,
string_agg(cast([AttendeeAddress] as [varchar](max)),'', '') As AttendeeAddresses,
MAX(CONVERT(tinyint,IsExternalEvent)) IsExternalEvent,
MAX(CONVERT(tinyint,EventWithManager)) EventWithManager,
MAX(CONVERT(tinyint,EventWithSubordinate)) EventWithSubordinate,
MAX(CONVERT(tinyint,IsRead)) IsRead
  FROM augmented_flattened_events
  where Version = ', '''',  pipeline().parameters.batchEndTime, '''' , '
  group by [iCalUId]) as agg_events
  CROSS APPLY
  (SELECT TOP (1)
[Id],
[CreatedDateTime],
[LastModifiedDateTime],
[iCalUId],
[Subject],
[Importance],
[Sensitivity],
[IsAllDay],
[IsCancelled],
[IsOrganizer],
[ResponseRequested],
[ContentType],
[Content],
[StartDateTime],
[StartTimeZone],
[EndDateTime],
[EndTimeZone],
[LocationDisplayName],
[AttendeeStatusResponse],
[AttendeeName],
[AttendeeAddress],
[Organizer],
[OrganizerName],
[ODataType],
[puser],
[ptenant],
[datarow],
[userrow],
[pagerow],
[OrganizerAboutMe],
[OrganizerBirthday],
[OrganizerHireDate],
[OrganizerMySite],
[OrganizerPreferredName],
[OrganizerAccountEnabled],
[OrganizerCity],
[OrganizerCompanyName],
[OrganizerCountry],
[OrganizerCreatedDateTime],
[OrganizerDepartment],
[OrganizerDisplayName],
[OrganizerGivenName],
[OrganizerId],
[OrganizerJobTitle],
[OrganizerMail],
[OrganizerOfficeLocation],
[OrganizerOnPremisesImmutableId],
[OrganizerPostalCode],
[OrganizerPreferredLanguage],
[OrganizerState],
[OrganizerStreetAddress],
[OrganizerSurname],
[OrganizerUsageLocation],
[OrganizerUserPrincipalName],
[OrganizerUserType],
[OrganizerPuser],
[OrganizerPtenant],
[OrganizerPAdditionalInfo],
[OrganizerDatarow],
[OrganizerUserrow],
[OrganizerPagerow],
[IsExternalEvent],
[EventWithManager],
[EventWithSubordinate],
[OrganizerReportsTo],
[OrganizerManagerEmail]
FROM [dbo].[augmented_flattened_events] where iCalUId = agg_events.iCalUId) fev;')}
